org.displaytag.filter

Class BufferedResponseWrapper13Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • org.displaytag.filter.BufferedResponseWrapper13Impl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse, BufferedResponseWrapper

    public class BufferedResponseWrapper13Impl
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
implements BufferedResponseWrapper
    J2ee 1.3 implementation of BufferedResponseWrapper. Need to extend HttpServletResponseWrapper for Weblogic compatibility.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    rapruitt, Fabrizio Giustina

        public void setContentType(String type)
        The content type is NOT set on the wrapped response. You must set it manually. Overrides any previously set value.
        Specified by:

      • getCharacterEncoding

        public String getCharacterEncoding()
        If the app server sets the character encoding of the response, it is sticky and you will not be able to change it. Therefore it is intercepted here.
        Specified by:
        getCharacterEncoding in interface javax.servlet.ServletResponse
        Overrides:
        getCharacterEncoding in class javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
        Returns:
        the character encoding that was most recently set
